abstract: The social networking site, which is built around professional relationships, and its advisers will most likely complete the prospectus by the end of the quarter.
snippet: The social networking site, which is built around professional relationships, and its advisers will most likely complete the prospectus by the end of the quarter.
lead_paragraph: LinkedIn, the popular social networking site built around professional relationships, plans to go public this year and has hired banks to advise it on the process, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.

headline.main: LinkedIn Plans a Stock Offering This Year

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Evelyn M. Rusli
